about.title: Nice to meet you
about.description: I'm Eduardo, a software engineer with over nine years of experience in full-stack development, dedicated to creating scalable and impactful solutions. My professional journey spans various sectors, including finance, healthcare, e-commerce, and digital payments, where I've developed platforms serving millions of users.
about.description2: My expertise is particularly strong in front-end technologies like Angular, TypeScript, NgRx, and RxJS, and throughout this ecosystem, complemented by solid back-end skills in Node.js (including NestJS and Express) and .NET. I have experience designing microservices, implementing real-time systems, and integrating technologies like Kafka and Redis to enhance performance and reliability. I also focus on maintaining high code quality and automation using tools like Jest, Cypress, and Behat.
about.description3: Beyond my technical skills, I've led teams, mentored fellow developers, and played a fundamental role in strategic product and architecture decisions. I'm eager to leverage this experience in dynamic, high-performance environments where I can continue to grow, collaborate, and make a significant impact.
about.quote: It's easy to avoid mistakes; just don't do anything. But that would be the biggest mistake of all.

frontend.name: Front-end
frontend.description: I develop web interfaces adhering to the highest standards of quality and excellence in user experience.

backend.name: Back-end
backend.description: I develop secure and scalable systems, adhering to the highest quality standards, including clean code and design patterns, ensuring technical excellence.

mobile.name: Mobile
mobile.description: I create varied mobile interfaces, ranging from simple applications to complex systems, using advanced technologies.

contact.title: Let's talk?
contact.subtitle: I'm always open to new opportunities and interesting projects. If you have an idea or need help with development, don't hesitate to get in touch!
